DOC.brief_title: A Study Assess Efficacy Safety Vardenafil Treatment Male Patients With Erectile Dysfunction
DOC.criteria: Males erectile dysfunction 6 month three year accord NIH Consensus definition ( inability achieve maintain penile erection sufficient satisfactory sexual intercourse ) Stable , heterosexual relationship 6 month Age range : 18 year older Documented , write Informed Consent . A ) Previous current Medical Conditions Any unstable medical psychiatric condition substance abuse disorder , opinion Investigator , likely affect patient 's ability complete study preclude patient 's participation study Presence penile anatomical abnormality ( e.g . penile fibrosis Peyronie disease ) would significantly impair erectile function . Primary hypoactive sexual desire Erectile dysfunction spinal cord injury Retinitis pigmentosa . History positive test Hepatitis B surface antigen ( HbsAg ) Hepatitis C. Unstable angina pectoris History myocardial infarction , stroke , electrocardiographic ischaemia ( except stable angina ) , lifethreatening arrhythmia , within prior 6 month . Atrial tachyarrhythmia ( e.g . atrial fibrillation/flutter ) heart rate > 100 beat per minute screening Severe chronic liver disease liver function abnormality Clinically significant chronic haematological disease bleed disorder History significant peptic ulcer disease within one year Visit 1 . Resting hypotension ( rest systolic blood pressure < 90 mm Hg ) hypertension ( rest systolic blood pressure > 170 mm Hg rest diastolic blood pressure > 110 mm Hg ) Symptomatic postural hypotension within six month Visit 1 . Uncontrolled diabetes mellitus ( Haemoglobin A1c > 12 % ) History malignancy within past 5 year ( squamous basal cell skin cancer K prostatic ) . B ) Concomitant Medication 1 . Patients take nitrate nitric oxide donor ( e.g . molsidomine ) .2 . Patients take anticoagulant , exception antiplatelet agent . 3 . Patients take androgen ( e.g . testosterone ) , trazodone antiandrogens . 4 . Patients take follow potent inhibitor cytochrome P 450 3A4 : HIV protease inhibitor ritonavir indinavir , antimycotic agent itraconazole ketoconazole ( topical form allow ) . 5 . Patients receive investigational drug ( include placebo ) within 30 day Visit 1 . 6 . Use vardenafil ( BAY 389456 ) time prior study . C ) Abnormal Laboratory Values 1 . Patients serum total testosterone level > 10 % low limit normal ( accord range specify responsible laboratory ) . 2 . Patients serum creatinine > 2.5 mg/dL.D ) Other Exclusion Criteria 1 .
